name: A button to press when you are bored
name_original: A button to press when you are bored
description:
Boredom has been my constant companion, until I discovered the cure - a giant button to press! With one push, boredom is banished, and hilarity ensues. I'm now the life of the party... or at least, the life of my own life.

Don't tell me you're feeling bored too? Well, my friend, allow me to introduce you to the ultimate boredom buster - a button to press! Download it now and prepare for endless amounts of fun. You can thank me later.
